name: covid19-passbook-generator
description: A simple PWA to scan your EU digital COVID Certificate and generate a passbook from it
author: Thibault Milan <hello@thibaultmilan.com>

scripts.start: npx parcel serve src/*.html --https && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
scripts.start-netlify-dev: npx parcel serve src/*.html && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
scripts.deploy-preview: npx parcel build src/*.html && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
scripts.build: npx parcel build src/*.html && cp node_modules/qr-scanner/qr-scanner-worker.min.js dist/qr-scanner-worker.min.js
